page.title: 06Social Life In The Villages
page.content: Scalford Youth Club was built in 1978. Some of the money was raised by the people of Scalford and some given by the County Council. The building is used for many things, like meetings of the{Youth Club,}badminton, Bingo and the village auction which is held once a year. People can book the hall for wedding receptions and parties. {The Scalford Badminton Club}has two sections, a junior class and a senior class. There is an official team which is in the Melton League and is doing quite well. Also in the village there is a{Women's Institute}holding monthly meetings and a{British Legion}group. Other clubs in Scalford include {The Friends of Scalford School,}a{Keep {Fit}group and a{Playgroup}for young children. There are no clubs or societies in any of the other villages in our area.
